citeulike_paper.title: Towards a distributed search engine
citeulike_paper.abstract: In this invited talk we address the algorithmic problems behind a truly distributed Web search engine. The main goal is to reduce the cost of a Web search engine while keeping all the benefits of a centralized search engine in spite of the intrinsic network latency imposed by Internet. The key ideas to achieve this goal are layered caching, online prediction mechanisms and exploit the locality and distribution of queries.
